attributes.review: shortly after downloading this app my iphone keyboard got stuck in the horizontal position regardless of the orientation of my phone. it was slow & glitchy & wouldnt let me navigate through pages. definitely needs work.
attributes.title: glitches

attributes.review: i am outraged😡😡😡😡😡😡 i downloaded this app so i could support my beloved donald😍🥰😘😙😙😍BUT the second i opened the app I WAS MET WITH TERRIFYING IMAGE OF A MAN WITH A SPRAN TAN AND A WIG😨😨 it was so scary i threw my phone and immediately began shaking and crying. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE😭😭😢😣😖😫😩☹️😟😔😔
attributes.title: JUMP SCARES

attributes.review: It SO bad. The worst. I thought he said it would be the BEST. but he was wrong. We should lock this app in the bunker with him next time.

attributes.review: ugly interface, not user friendly, and it lowered my IQ by 20 points:/ would not recommend
